forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West wind 15 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, today unfolds under a sky mostly kissed by sunshine, a rare gift for this city. With a gentle warmth that settles near 64 degrees, the afternoon invites a subtle dip to around 62, accompanied by a refreshing breeze from the west-southwest that dances between 8 to 24 mph, bringing even higher gusts that stir the leaves and the spirit. While the allure of sun-infused moments prevails, shadows stretch and shift as bands of clouds begin their slow ascent, heralding an evening where the sky will cloak itself in a more muted palette, resting against the cool embrace of a low around 55. Likewise, the wind will remain active, infusing the twilight with an invigorating chill.

The day appears to beckon for leisurely pursuits. Strolling through the streets adorned with eclectic shops and cafes seems particularly enticing, as does lingering in a sun-soaked park, perhaps with a book or a friendly conversation. As evening approaches, a light jacket or a cozy wrap will be your companion against the cool breeze, providing just enough warmth to make the most of the unfolding night. With the marine layer hovering discreetly in the distance, the coast may wear a veil of fog, but the heart of the city offers clarity and charm, perfect for savoring the everyday moments that make life rich and satisfying.
